message.content:
1. It is advisable to start body-powered training with indirect grasping tasks.
2. It is also recommended to practice hook-object orientations in body-powered training.

messages.content:
Statement: It is advisable to start body-powered training with indirect grasping tasks but also to practice hook-object orientations.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
